attributes.action: Make Jay Walking an Offence across the UK & NI
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Drivers are constantly the focus for ways in which money can be squeezed from them.  It is about time that those inconsiderate pedestrians who walk infront of moving vehicles with total disregard for their own lives should be fined on the spot.  It should be made an offence not to cross roads at designated crossing points as is the case in Germany.
